and part of the Tara mountains. Tara is comprised of two sections, which were once independent towns: Tara (多良) and Oura (大浦). Tara is located quite close to the Kashima Gatalympics, which takes place near Hizen-Iida Station.
Tara is serviced by the JR Kyushu railroad company.  It has two stations and one switchbox.
The closest airport is Saga Airport, followed by one in
